name: SpiritVR
description:
My final project as an Immersive experience creator student. A small proof of concept for a VR game. We spent 1 month on this project. We still have a lot of improvements we want to do for the game and will come with updates later on.

Use the grip button to grab items and give them to your ally. If the oculus reposition button doesn't position the island correctly, you can try the option button.

When the enemy is defeated, you can restart by grabbing the door.

Items:

Yellow cube: Attack speed buff

Tree: Defense buff

Flowers: HP recovery over time

Mushroom: Crit rate +30%

Falling Star: Damage buff
